name: Create msg object
func:
var message = "Gate reports " + msg.payload + ".."

return { payload: message,topic:msg.topic };

name: Create msg object
Vacuum Whole House Flow
info:
This flow is triggered via the front-end.  When
triggered it sends an mqtt message to the 
`/nodered/vacuum_whole_house` topic to trigger
this flow.

name: Update roborock_s4_last_cleaned sensor value Flow
info:
These flow updates the `roborock_s4_last_cleaned`
sensor value every 5 minutes.  This is required
because the `value_template` does a relative time
calculation to populate the value.  Since the
calculation it's done on is calculated from now and
a date of a state attribute it normally only gets
updated when the state attribute is updated which
is typically once a day.  Now it will update it
every 5 minutes so that the relative time is
mostly up to date.

name: Toggling Roborock Daily Run Boolean
info:
These automations manage the state of the
`roborock_daily_run` input boolean.

**Note:** The clean zone command can only do 5
zones at a time.  Since we have 6, when it finishes
the 5th we check a global variable to see if we've
cleaned the 6th yet (guest bedroom).  If not we
clean it then set the daily run input boolean to true.

name: Maintenance Notifications Flows
info:
These flows send notifications when filters need
to be replaced or sensors need to be cleaned.

name: Check Filter
Check Side Brush
info: Sets the msg payload if needed.

name: Check Main Brush
Check Sensors
Auto Run Vacuum Automation
info:
This automation can be triggered in 1 of 3 ways:

 * Manually invoked by hitting the inject node.
 * When no one is home if it has not run today and is not currently cleaning.
 * If at 2PM someone is still home and it hasn't run today.

var message = "Sprinkler auto-run: " + msg.payload.name + " ran for " +  msg.payload.time + " minutes"

return { alert: message };
